mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq(faq_id, member_id, question, content, reg_date, hit_count, update_date) VALUES(#{faq_id}, #{member_id}, #{question}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET question = #{question}, content = #{content}, update_date = sysdate WHERE faq_id = #{faq_id}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM faq f JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id

SELECT f.faq_id, f.member_id, question, content, hit_count, TO_CHAR(update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') update_date, m.nickname FROM faq f JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id
ORDER BY reg_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT f.faq_id, f.member_id, f.question, f.content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, hit_count, TO_CHAR(update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') update_date, m.nickname FROM faq f JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id WHERE faq_id = #{faq_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET hit_count = hit_count + 1 WHERE faq_id = #{faq_id}
